lines.text: [after being benched, for errors mis-handling the baseball, Spanky sent Fatty off the field of teammates and Froggy suggested Rover could replace Fatty]
I should have been born a dog.
[as the Our Gang members start to leave Mammoth Pictures Studio Professor Ventriloko speaks with them, normally and with his dummy]

[through his dummy]
What's the matter, Rover? Don't you like the moving picture business?
No. I'd rather play baseball, that's my racket. Ha, ha, ha.

[through his dummy]
Oh a wise guy, huh?
[closing credits begin, after their brief meeting]
